snippet: As more consumers order gifts online, they are being advised to be proactive against thefts, by tracking packages and requiring signatures upon delivery.
abstract: Rising number of thieves are stealing packages left on people's doorsteps during holiday season; Better Business Bureau advises consumers ordering gifts online to be proactive against thefts by tracking their packages and requiring signatures upon delivery.
lead_paragraph: As more consumers order gifts online, they are being advised to be proactive against thefts, by tracking packages and requiring signatures upon delivery.

headline.seo: Thefts a Concern as Holiday Deliveries Increase
headline.main: Holiday Boxes on Stoops Bring Reports of Thefts
